COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118
STRING: Morning came, along with a pleasant awakening.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124
STRING: It wasn't even eight o'clock yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130
STRING: The only thing I remembered was that the recitals
began at ten.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c
STRING: We would get to school around eight-thirty, check what
time our turn was, and then practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152
STRING: Even if we were the very first to perform, that would
give us over an hour of practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a
STRING: [Chris] “Are you ready?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac
STRING: [Lise] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: She gave a hearty reply, full of confidence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce
STRING: If the recital went well... But even if it didn't, Lise had
changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4
STRING: I couldn't deny that what Grave said yesterday was part
of the reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa
STRING: I couldn't feel any gratitude, but someday I'd be able to
forgive him, perhaps.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x210
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e
STRING: [Lise] “See you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244
STRING: Imitating me, Lise bid goodbye to the room which had
been her home for the past week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a
STRING: Her saying it had a slightly different meaning, but it
made me happy nonetheless.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e
STRING: [Lise] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b2
STRING: Just before the door closed...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6
STRING: I thought I heard a familiar sound.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x316
STRING: The sky was clouded over, but it seemed brighter than
usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32c
STRING: And thanks to the fine, mist-like rain, we hardly got wet
at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x342
STRING: The rain today was so light, the tiny raindrops changed
direction whenever a strong wind blew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x358
STRING: The wind also made it a bit cold, but it looked like it'd
be a pleasant day, by this city's standards.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x396
STRING: We entered the hallway and went straight to the
bulletin board.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a2
STRING: The notice was dated the fourth day of this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b8
STRING: After my meeting with Ms. Cordell, I guess I hadn't been
to school at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ce
STRING: The one time I did come, I'd been so busy looking for
Lise, I didn't have time for this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x400
STRING: [Lise] “You are... Ah, the first performer of the afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x416
STRING: [Chris] “You're right. In that case, we still have plenty of
time to practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42c
STRING: The afternoon program was scheduled to start at 1:30.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: A footnote exhorted all students to gather by the
concert hall stage fifteen minutes before their turn.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x456
STRING: [Lise] “Then let's go find a practice room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46c
STRING: [Chris] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x490
STRING: Lise didn't seem to have very good memories of the
practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a6
STRING: But today, most of the students weren't practicing, and
the few who were practicing were all third years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: There wouldn't be anyone who knew her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d2
STRING: ...But soon, she wouldn't have to worry about that
anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e8
STRING: Everyone would recognize the beauty of her voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f4
STRING: I believed in her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x538
STRING: Also, today was probably my last day in this practice
room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x544
STRING: I hadn't been too keen on practicing as a student, but
looking around the room, I got a little emotional.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55a
STRING: [Chris] “This is my first time here with you, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58c
STRING: [Lise] “Yes. I was always practicing in the Old Wing,
that's why.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a2
STRING: [Chris] “But you'll be able to come here from now on,
yeah?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d4
STRING: [Lise] “...Yes. I know I can, even by myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: [Chris] “That's great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61c
STRING: [Lise] “Chris... You've always had my best interests in
mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63c
STRING: [Chris] “...Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: [Lise] “Just now, or when you first asked me to be your
partner...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67a
STRING: [Chris] “...You think so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: [Lise] “I know so. It's okay, you don't have to say
anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c2
STRING: [Chris] “...Alright, shall we practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e6
STRING: I prepared my Fortelle, and Lise and I practiced over
and over again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x784
STRING: When we were satisfied, we entered the concert hall,
fifteen minutes before our performance time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79a
STRING: That's because Lise wanted to take a look at the venue
beforehand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d4
STRING: [Lise] “This is where... I'll be singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ea
STRING: [Chris] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x808
STRING: [Lise] “Somehow... I'm getting nervous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81e
STRING: [Chris] “I thought you were used to performing on
stage...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x850
STRING: [Lise] “It's my first time... Singing in public.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x866
STRING: Lise looked around the hall with emotion in her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x872
STRING: Even though it was lunchtime, the hall was abuzz with
activity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87e
STRING: Many guests had come to watch the graduation recitals,
and because seats had been reserved for them, there
were surprisingly few seats left for students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x894
STRING: Those students who were serious about listening to the
performances never left their seats, apparently, so that
they wouldn't be taken by others.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8aa
STRING: There may have been some students there who knew
Lise, but she didn't seem at all concerned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8dc
STRING: [Lise] “Come on, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f2
STRING: Lise gave one last look at the stage before moving.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x938
STRING: We reached the side of the stage at exactly fifteen
minutes before my turn to perform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94e
STRING: A student worker told me that those going on after a
break were to prepare their equipment while the
curtain was down, so I quickly set up my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x976
STRING: On the other side of the curtain, the audience was
getting noisier by the second, which told me that it was
almost time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98c
STRING: From the bag, I took out the score that Lise had copied
out for me, and flipped through it one more time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a2
STRING: It was slightly different from the original song that Grave
wrote, surely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b8
STRING: If only we'd taken that score home yesterday, then I
could've made the necessary corrections...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ea
STRING: [Lise] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa00
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, I'd noticed some differences when I saw
the original score yesterday, but in the end, I forgot
them all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3c
STRING: [Lise] “...But this score was something we created
together, Chris, based on our memories. It's much more
suitable for today's performance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah, I guess it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: Lise was absolutely right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa88
STRING: But if there was one thing I could change, I'd give this
song that Lise and I had made, the lyrics of a love song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9e
STRING: The issue of Grave's personality aside, this song was
made for singing about love.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab4
STRING: Ms. Cordell and Phorni's reactions had been spot on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: [Lise] “...Now I'm really getting nervous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf2
STRING: [Chris] “Was it the same when you played the Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb24
STRING: [Lise] “...No. When I played the Fortelle... I didn't feel
nervous at all. Not because I was sure of my abilities...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb56
STRING: [Lise] “That is... It's because I was playing for Father's
sake.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6c
STRING: [Chris] “How about now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9e
STRING: [Lise] “Of course, I'm also doing it for you... But... I want
to sing for myself. Maybe that's why I'm so nervous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc8
STRING: Lise put her arms around herself as she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: Her body trembled ever so slightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: [Chris] “Lise... Give me your hand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1c
STRING: [Lise] “Huh? O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc32
STRING: I took the hand that she tremulously held out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5a
STRING: [Lise] “...Ah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc70
STRING: [Chris] “You're right. Your pulse is racing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8e
STRING: [Lise] “...That's your fault, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca4
STRING: Lise looked around nervously, as if worried that
someone might see us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: There were several students on either side of the stage,
including the students-in-charge.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd0
STRING: But they all looked too busy to care about what we
were doing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: So we stood there for a while, holding hands, and Lise
gradually regained her composure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Lise] “...Thank you. I feel a lot calmer now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd24
STRING: [Chris] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd58
STRING: Then Lise quietly pulled her hand away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd64
STRING: I didn't want the moment to end, but I had no choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd70
STRING: That was when I noticed someone walking up behind
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc2
STRING: [Cordell] “Good morning. It seems you both made it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd8
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. We even practiced earlier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: [Cordell] “I've never heard you say those words before,
Chris. Liselsia, it's been a while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe46
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes. Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe64
STRING: [Cordell] “By the way, you're looking very confident.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe84
STRING: [Chris] “...Well, yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb6
STRING: [Cordell] “How interesting, you actually gave a direct
answer. Does that mean you'll put on a convincing
performance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed6
STRING: I didn't expect Ms. Cordell to ask such a pointed
question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee2
STRING: “Convince me.” She'd said that to me before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeee
STRING: And in fact, we had made a similar promise to Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf04
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, we will. It'll be convincing, for sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf36
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf68
STRING: [Cordell] “Excellent.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9a
STRING: Just then, the buzzer sounded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: [Cordell] “It's time... Go on, show them what you've got.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd8
STRING: [Chris] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100a
STRING: [Lise] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1024
STRING: I heard the sound of the curtain being raised
mechanically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1030
STRING: Holding out scores in one hand, we walked on stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105c
STRING: From the stage, it was too dark to make out the faces in
the audience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1072
STRING: Some of them were probably acquainted with Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107e
STRING: Lise looked around the stage a little anxiously, then she
took a deep breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b4
STRING: I sat down in front of the Fortelle and looked straight at
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c0
STRING: Everything that had happened until that point flashed
across my mind in an instant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10cc
STRING: We'd endured many things to get to this moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d8
STRING: Some had been hard to bear, some had even hurt Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e4
STRING: But in spite of that, here we stood on this stage, about
to perform an ensemble for the sake of our future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fa
STRING: It was a daunting goal, but going back to basics, the
best thing to do was to have fun performing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1110
STRING: And so I whispered to her, barely moving my mouth at
all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111c
STRING: [Chris] “Lise... Have fun singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113a
STRING: [Lise] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1150
STRING: After a moment's breath, we began our performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c4
STRING: We were bathed in thunderous applause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d0
STRING: Lise was shocked, and just stared blankly at the
audience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: I felt the same way as Lise, but my reaction was more
restrained, because I'd kind of guessed this would
happen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1206
STRING: This was dramatic proof that her voice could move the
hearts of those who heard her sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121c
STRING: Looking at the number of people applauding, no one
could doubt that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1228
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123e
STRING: I called out to Lise, motioning for her to take a bow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126e
STRING: [Lise] “R-Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1284
STRING: We took a deep bow, and walked off the stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d0
STRING: [Cordell] “Very well done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e6
STRING: Coming from Ms. Cordell, that was high praise indeed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f2
STRING: I was genuinely happy to hear that, but right now, there
was something else on my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1310
STRING: [Cordell] “Oh, Mr. Cesarini left a message. He said to go
straight to the lecture room. He asked me to tell you
that after your performance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: Ms. Cordell said that with a smile, as if she knew exactly
what was going on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1350
STRING: [Chris] “Then we'll be on our way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1382
STRING: [Cordell] “Yes. Oh, there was another message.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1398
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b6
STRING: [Cordell] “This one's from Tortinita. She'd been worried
about you, but she left right after hearing your recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d6
STRING: [Chris] “...So, what did she say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1408
STRING: [Cordell] “‘You really worked hard.’ That's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141e
STRING: [Chris] “O-Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: [Cordell] “Now then, off you go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1466
STRING: [Chris] “R-Right. Come on, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1498
STRING: [Lise] “Let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ae
STRING: We were full of confidence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ba
STRING: It wasn't possible for anyone to not be convinced by
that performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d0
STRING: They were still applauding when we left the hall for our
destination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1532
STRING: When we entered the room, Grave had a look of mild
displeasure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1548
STRING: Or so I thought, because it was gone the next instant,
which left me wondering if it had really been there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x155e
STRING: Lise, who came in after me, saw nothing at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156a
STRING: Perhaps it had been my bad impression of Grave that
made me see him that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159c
STRING: [Grave] “How good of you to come.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b2
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ec
STRING: [Lise] “Father... Did you hear our performance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1602
STRING: Lise skipped over everything and went right to the
point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1618
STRING: Even though I knew what the result would be, I was still
nervous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162c
STRING: [Grave] “Yes... I heard it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164a
STRING: [Lise] “So... Father?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1668
STRING: [Grave] “How could anyone not approve?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167e
STRING: The disdain in his voice... But to Lise, even that probably
sounded like kindness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1694
STRING: As if the stubborn father in some fable had broken
down at last, with tears in his eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16aa
STRING: To be fair, it looked that way to me too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: But t here was definitely a hint of coldness in his voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e8
STRING: [Lise] “So, we're all good?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1706
STRING: [Grave] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171c
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1748
STRING: [Grave] “...Chris Vertin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x175e
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1792
STRING: [Grave] “Take good care of Liselsia for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17bc
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d2
STRING: Lise didn't notice a word of that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17de
STRING: Her cheeks were just flushed with joy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f2
STRING: [Grave] “Now then, you should come pick up the score.
Let's go, Liselsia.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1850
STRING: [Lise] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186a
STRING: [Chris] “W-Wait a minute...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x189c
STRING: [Lise] “It's fine. I'll be right back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b2
STRING: [Chris] “...No, it's not that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c8
STRING: Grave had already walked out of the lecture room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18de
STRING: Just now... What was that all about?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ea
STRING: Lise ran over and gave me a quick kiss on my cheek.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1912
STRING: [Lise] “See you later. I'll go to your room, Chris, so just
wait for me, please.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1932
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195e
STRING: I tried many times to grab Lise's arm before she ran off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196a
STRING: But in the end, I could only watch as she left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1980
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1996
STRING: I felt an indescribable anxiety which wouldn't go away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ac
STRING: Grave's smile as he walked out of the lecture room
remained seared in my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fa
STRING: I believed in Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a06
STRING: But that didn't lessen my anxiety.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a12
STRING: How long did I wait for her that day, I wonder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1e
STRING: A feeble knock brought me back to reality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a3a
STRING: [Chris] “Lise!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a50
STRING: Right away, I knew it had to be Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a64
STRING: When I opened the door, Lise was leaning against it...
Then she slowly collapsed on the floor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aba
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad0
STRING: Quickly, I propped her up to see how she was doing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1adc
STRING: This was...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af8
STRING: [Lise] “＊cough＊ ＊cough＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0e
STRING: A dry, raspy voice came from Lise's throat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1a
STRING: Her neck was still bandaged... But it showed signs of a
fresh wound.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b40
STRING: [Chris] “Why... Why?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5e
STRING: [Grave] “Why? Because I did so, and there's nothing to
be done about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b96
STRING: [Chris] “Grave!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bac
STRING: For the first time, I called him by name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc0
STRING: [Grave] “Keep your voice down. You'll disturb the
neighbors.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd6
STRING: [Chris] “...What have you done?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bec
STRING: I asked weakly, because that was all I could do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf8
STRING: Even my momentary fit of anger had cooled instantly as
I held Lise, still shaking, on my knee.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c16
STRING: [Grave] “You were going to take my prized possession
away from me. It makes sense that I should take
Liselsia's away from her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c40
STRING: [Chris] “...Stop talking nonsense.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5e
STRING: [Grave] “I see you still haven't learned any manners, boy.
But no matter, I'll let you off today. In any case, please
take good care of Liselsia.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c88
STRING: [Chris] “You're insane... So all that was a lie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca6
STRING: [Grave] “It was the truth. Well, half of it anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cbc
STRING: Grave sniggered at his own joke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd0
STRING: [Grave] “Esque... Liselsia's mother, she abandoned her
daughter and abandoned me... for another man.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf0
STRING: Grave went on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d04
STRING: [Grave] “She was seen associating with some common
singer...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d22
STRING: [Grave] “I had no use for the child of such a woman, and
so I left her at the shelter, but then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4a
STRING: [Grave] “Imagine my surprise when, a few years later, I
went to check on her and found her playing the
Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d72
STRING: [Grave] “Some of my blood ran in her veins after all, it
seemed. I tried to teach her, but alas, she turned out
just like her mother. Misled by some common boy into
singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d9c
STRING: [Chris] “...Shut up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dba
STRING: [Grave] “I loved Liselsia deeply, that is the truth. But she
betrayed me, in spite of the knowledge that I was her
real father.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de4
STRING: [Chris] “She was truly happy to hear that... And yet...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0c
STRING: [Grave] “You may do as you please, both of you. I will
disown her soon enough. I want nothing to do with that
woman's daughter, ever again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e36
STRING: [Chris] “...Shut up, and get out of my sight.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e54
STRING: [Grave] “Your days as a musician are over, of course. It
wouldn't have worked out. You may have talent, but
you are far too stupid.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e74
STRING: [Chris] “...I said, shut up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8a
STRING: I wanted to hit him, but I had to stay by Lise's side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea0
STRING: Anyway, the first thing I had to was bring her to the
hospital after Grave left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ebe
STRING: [Grave] “And so, I leave my daughter in your hands. Too
bad she will never sing again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ef6
STRING: [Chris] “Lise... Hey, Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0c
STRING: I tried not to look at the unnatural depression on Lise's
neck.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f22
STRING: In the distance, I heard a car driving off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f36
STRING: [Lise] “＊gasp＊ ＊cough＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4c
STRING: She wouldn't come to for some time, it seemed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f7e
STRING: Holding her, I went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2084
STRING: [Chris] “We're here, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c2
STRING: Lise didn't respond, of course, as I brought her inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ce
STRING: She remained in Piova's hospital for a while, but as soon
as her condition was stable, we left the rainy city and I
had her transferred to a hospital in my hometown.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ee
STRING: I opened the window to let in some air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20fa
STRING: A gentle breeze entered the room, freshening the air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2110
STRING: We were in a corner room on the second floor, and
there was nothing to block out the sun.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2126
STRING: [Chris] “Lise. How are you feeling today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216c
STRING: [Lise] “Uh... Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2182
STRING: [Chris] “It's a fine day today. The sunlight feels really
good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a2
STRING: Without looking at me, Lise said something in a small
voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ae
STRING: She responded when I spoke to her, but she didn't
understand who I was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c4
STRING: Even so, the doctor said that speaking to her was
important.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21da
STRING: I visited her every day and played the Fortelle for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f8
STRING: Every day, until the end of visiting hours, I was by her
side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x220e
STRING: Lise really had nowhere to return to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x221a
STRING: The only place Lise could be was by my side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2226
STRING: And the only place I could be, was by her side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: [Chris] “Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2250
STRING: [Lise] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a6
STRING: As I played the Fortelle, almost devoid of emotion, I
heard someone knocking on the door behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22bc
STRING: Who could it be?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c8
STRING: It wasn't time for the doctor to stop by, and I'd arranged
it such that I would do everything the nurses did for Lise
while I was visiting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22fe
STRING: [???] “...I'm coming in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2314
STRING: I stopped playing, but made no move to open the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2320
STRING: I thought whoever it was might've made a mistake,
but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2360
STRING: [Torta] “...I heard something bad had happened, so I
came to visit...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2380
STRING: [Chris] “...Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b2
STRING: [Torta] “How is she?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c8
STRING: [Chris] “...Well, why don't you sit down? It's a long
story.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23fa
STRING: [Torta] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2410
STRING: Torta took a chair from the corner of the room and
unfolded it next to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2426
STRING: There hadn't been anyone else visiting aside from me,
so it felt a little strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x243c
STRING: [Chris] “Where should I begin? After the graduation
recital, I guess? Or perhaps from the time I met Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2478
STRING: [Torta] “...Your graduation recital was great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248e
STRING: [Chris] “Really? Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a4
STRING: We seemed to be talking past each other, but I went on
anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ba
STRING: [Chris] “If I start from the very beginning, it's going to
take a while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ec
STRING: [Torta] “...Well, if you want to talk, I'll listen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2502
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, it was when I was looking for a partner.
I got tired and went to the music room in the Old Wing,
when I heard a beautiful voice singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252c
STRING: Still seated in front of the Fortelle, I gazed out of the
window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x257c
STRING: I told Torta everything that had happened until that
point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2588
STRING: Everything I'd thought, everything I'd felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a0
STRING: It was a long story to tell, it took over an hour.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ae
STRING: As I told it, it occurred to me that Lise wasn't able to
hear me play the Fortelle, which made me a little
worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ce
STRING: But I really needed to talk to someone, and besides, I
had to let Torta know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e6
STRING: I finished my story, and realized that I was in tears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2614
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2646
STRING: [Torta] “...Chris. You've been through a lot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x265c
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2672
STRING: And all at once, all the pain and sadness came rushing
out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2688
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry, I... I can't talk right now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ba
STRING: [Torta] “...That's okay. Should I go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26d0
STRING: [Chris] “No... It's... It's fine. I... I'll be okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fe
STRING: In between my sobs, I looked at Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270a
STRING: She was responding to my voice, and her face was
turned slightly toward me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2740
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... Ch-Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2756
STRING: Then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2762
STRING: Lise said my name, for the first time since that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276e
STRING: I had placed the Fortelle near the bed so Lise could
listen closely, which meant I could easily reach out to
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x278e
STRING: Lise's slender hand left its hiding place under the sheets
and reached out for mine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a4
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ba
STRING: Our hands touched, and I felt that all my efforts had
paid off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c6
STRING: It didn't matter if she couldn't sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d2
STRING: As long as Lise was beside me, I didn't care.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e6
STRING: [Lise] “Uh... Ah?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27fc
STRING: I was still crying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2808
STRING: Lise looked puzzled by my tear-stained face, then a little
sad as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2834
STRING: [Lise] “...Uh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284a
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay... It's going to be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2860
STRING: Feeling the warmth of her palm gave me strength.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286c
STRING: It was all going to be okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2878
STRING: For Lise, and for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2884
STRING: I would never cry again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2890
STRING: Here, for the rest of my days, I would play the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e2
STRING: [Torta] “...Yeah, I'm definitely leaving.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28f8
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... I'm sorry you had to witness that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292a
STRING: [Torta] “No, it's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2940
STRING: [Chris] “I won't be able to see you out, so I guess this is
goodbye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2972
STRING: [Torta] “...Yes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a0
STRING: Can I ask one last thing, though?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ac
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Sure, go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29de
STRING: [Torta] “Is this your idea of atonement?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29f4
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a26
STRING: [Torta] “...Nothing. Forget it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a3c
STRING: [Chris] “Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a6e
STRING: [Torta] “So long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab2
STRING: And with that, Torta left the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2abe
STRING: All we could do was see her go.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aca
STRING: [Chris] “...Well then. Hey, Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b00
STRING: [Lise] “...Uh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b16
STRING: [Chris] “It's all good. I'll play the Fortelle for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4c
STRING: The sound of my Fortelle playing filled the room once
more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2be4
STRING: [Chris] “Looks like today's going to be another nice day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bfa
STRING: As usual, I opened the window to ventilate the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c06
STRING: While holding down a job, I continued to visit her every
day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c12
STRING: I could only come this early on my days off, but in any
case, making the effort to show up wasn't that hard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c52
STRING: Recently, just by appearing in the room, I would make
Lise smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c68
STRING: When I sat in front of the Fortelle, she looked even
happier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca4
STRING: Almost a year had passed since that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cb0
STRING: Spring came, summer went by, fall was over, and it was
winter once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cbc
STRING: Lise was still the same, but one thing had changed
about her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cd4
STRING: The nameplate on the door to her hospital room no
longer said Liselsia, it was now Liselsia Vertin.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cea
STRING: She was still mostly incapacitated, so nothing had
changed officially.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d00
STRING: It was just a private whim of mine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0e
STRING: Besides, I didn't think that Lise would object, and it also
helped define my feelings on the matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d24
STRING: And someday, if it were possible, the ceremony would
have to be held.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d3a
STRING: But that was all in the future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d48
STRING: Filled with such happy thoughts, I sat down in front of
the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d76
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d8c
STRING: I continued playing this song without words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d98
STRING: Words of love had once accompanied these sounds.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2da4
STRING: This song was surely a song to be offered to a lover.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2db0
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc6
STRING: Grave had once told me to give up on music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dd2
STRING: But here I was, side by side with music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dde
STRING: Music wasn't only something to be presented in front of
large crowds in concert halls.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2df4
STRING: Performing for the one you love and cherish was just as
marvelous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e1a
STRING: Then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e3c
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e62
STRING: [Lise] “No matter what today may bring...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e7e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e9a
STRING: [Lise] “A new one soon will take its place...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ee0
STRING: And tomorrow was filled with hope.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x304a
STRING: After our performance, we were greeted with applause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3056
STRING: To be honest, it hadn't been that bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3062
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3092
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30a8
STRING: I felt an incredible sense of ennui.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30b4
STRING: Two students were waiting to perform at the side of the
stage, and the student-in-charge motioned for us to get
off fast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30d4
STRING: We took a bow and exited the stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3116
STRING: [Cordell] “...Welcome back. That wasn't bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3144
STRING: You'll
graduate, I'm sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3150
STRING: Ms. Cordell sounded quite disappointed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x315c
STRING: I knew she had high expectations, but it was my fault
for not being able to meet them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3172
STRING: [Chris] “...I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3190
STRING: [Cordell] “What, I said it wasn't bad, didn't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a6
STRING: Normally, coming from Ms. Cordell, that was a
compliment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31b2
STRING: But right now, I couldn't take any pleasure in it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31f0
STRING: [Cordell] “Oh, I have a message for you. Mr. Cesarini
said to go straight to the lecture room. He asked me to
tell you that after your performance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x321a
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x325a
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3270
STRING: [Chris] “...Let's go, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x328e
STRING: [Lise] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a4
STRING: The thought of escaping there and then also crossed
my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32b0
STRING: But in the end, I couldn't do it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32f0
STRING: In front of the lecture room, I apologized to Lise, just
once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32fc
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x332e
STRING: [Lise] “...D-Don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3344
STRING: [Chris] “Even if I'm not good enough now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3376
STRING: [Lise] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338c
STRING: [Chris] “Even if I'm not good enough now, I'll practice
until I earn his approval, and then I'll ask you again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33c8
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33de
STRING: [Chris] “Wait for that day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x343e
STRING: I opened the door, and there was Grave, seated in a
chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x344a
STRING: Despite his purported impartiality as a judge, he looked
as if he'd been waiting his whole life for this moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x347c
STRING: [Grave] “How nice of you to come.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3492
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34b0
STRING: [Grave] “You understand, of course?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c6
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34f8
STRING: [Lise] “...Father.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3516
STRING: [Grave] “Excuses will not be tolerated. Chris Vertin, you
know that as well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3536
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes, that is correct.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3576
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x358c
STRING: I said her name once, then I bowed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35a0
STRING: [Grave] “Well then, get out of my sight.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c4
STRING: Lise was staring at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35d0
STRING: I stared back, proving that what I'd said to her earlier
was the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e6
STRING: Then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35f2
STRING: I left the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3658
STRING: I looked up at the sky and made a vow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3664
STRING: I was determined to pursue Lise, that was the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3670
STRING: Today's failure would not go to waste.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x367c
STRING: Someday...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3688
STRING: I wasn't good enough now, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3694
STRING: Believing that I'd definitely see Lise again, I started
walking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36a0
STRING: I had to become a professional musician.
